issue.title: Controlling Pan Tilt Gimbal using JointControlPlugin and JointStatePublisher

content.raw:
I have gotten this to work by modifying ros\_ign\_bridge code and adding conversions between std\_msgs::Float64 and ignition::msgs::Double. I have issued a pull request on the ros\_ign git repo:

[https://github.com/osrf/ros\_ign/pull/64](https://github.com/osrf/ros_ign/pull/64)

We will finish modeling the pan/tilt assuming that this pull request will eventually make its way into subt’s system. Any problems with this? We will try to implement a similar fix for converting between ignition.msgs.Joint and ros sensor\_msgs/JointState.
